name: com.unityaiforge
description: AI-powered Unity development toolkit. MCP bridge with 64 tools including GameKit 3-Pillar Architecture (UI: Binding/List/Slot/Selection, Logic: Actor/Combat/Health/AI, Presentation: VFX/Audio/Feedback), Machinations economics, scene flow, declarative UI hierarchy, UI state/navigation, graph analysis (class dependency, scene reference, scene relationship), Physics2D/3D, 2D/3D animation, and batch sequential execution for intelligent game creation through AI collaboration.
